episode: I am annoyed by unknown phone calls

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am annoyed by unknown phone calls repeatedly

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those can be really frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yeah

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Do you answer them or just ignore?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Initially I attend the call but i told them i don't want their services but they don't understand and called me again

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: They just won't take no for an answer, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes then I decided to not go to attend their calls any more

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Blocking their number might be the next step.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You're right. I just did what you have said

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad I could help, problem solved!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes you too find a solution as well as me decision

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ha ha, thanks, I'm glad we both found a solution together!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thats great really

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Thanks, me too!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Here after I will block unknown numbers on their first calls

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wise decision!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: thank you so much

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: have a nice day

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You too!
